CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Related_Campaign__r.Campaign_Type__c, "Corporate Lead"), "企個名單", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Related_Campaign__r.Campaign_Type__c, "Prospect Lead"), "拓客名單", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Related_Campaign__r.Campaign_Type__c, "General Lead"), "一般名單", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Related_Campaign__r.Campaign_Type__c, "Oversea TMRAC Campaign"), "Oversea TMRAC Campaign", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Related_Campaign__r.Campaign_Type__c, "Oversea General Campaign"), "Oversea General Campaign", "")
CustomField.label: 名單類別
